stu_tags: CARING  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Cool and chill dude. Fun and gets to know you. There is a lot of online assignments, but he gives extensions. There are presentations each chapter, but they\'re not bad. There is a semester project also, it\'s a bit overwhelming but not too much. Exams aren\'t hard and usually open book.

comments: Overall he is a great professor. Gives a lot of homework. Very laid back and easy going in my opinion. Not a tough grader as well as understanding. Gives a lot of opportunities for extra credit, would take advantage.

comments: Take Senor Hunter if you are able to!!! You will not regret it. Absolutely amazing. Caring. Intelligent. Do the work, put in effort, and you will do fine. This course is difficult no matter what but with Senor Hunter you will certainly succeed.

comments: One of the best professors I\'ve ever had. The class is extremely difficult but he makes it as easy as possible. Lectures are fun. There is a ton of homework but it is necessary. His expectations are clear.

stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Overall good teacher. You need to work for it. A LOT of online homework which can be the main way you learn and can make or break your grade. Online work is a must do! Right in the middle of the semester he will switch to all spanish and sometimes you will have no idea what he is saying. Will say he is pretty easy on the eyes though.

comments: I really enjoyed having him as a professor. He is very passionate about not only the language, but the culture. Yes, there is a lot of homework, but it\'s necessary. The tests really aren\'t that bad. I would say it\'s pretty easy to pass the class as long as you show up and pay attention and participate. ALSO there are a lot of group activities.

comments: This teacher is amazing. I am currently taking all the Spanish classes with him. only down side is if you do not like doing internet activities then this class is not for you. but if you don\'t mind then take it. this teacher is fair and understanding of what a student goes though and helps out when possible.

comments: Brian Hunter was at first a very good professor, but then within 3 weeks he drops english entirely and expected us to catch on instantly although it was a beginner class. He didn\'t grade fairly, he acted as though he didn\'t recieve any papers I gave him and marked me absent even though I was there. He expects everyone to know spanish. Bad professor

comments: Great instructor. Loves the language. Teaching style is clear and thorough. Very forgiving on quizzes, tests, and overall grading. He will help you with individual writing and speaking assignments and allways makes you feel good and interested in the language.
